name: wheat stitch™ pumpkin spice crochet trio
notes:

❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️


get into the fall season with the **pumpkin spice crochet trio**! this charming crochet pumpkin pattern offers a delightfully textured stitch and comes in three sizes, weaving the warmth of autumn and the joy of crafting into one lovely project. these pretty pumpkins are crocheted flat, then seamed and stuffed, and finished with a cinnamon stick and burlap ribbons. 
*originally published september 2024*

perfect for crocheters of all levels, this pattern comes with detailed instructions, including a full video tutorial to guide you through each step.

crochet hook:
[h (5.0mm) - or size to meet gauge][1]


notions:
[removable stitch marker][2]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][3]
[scissors][4]
[fiberfill][5]
[cinnamon stick][6]
[burlap ribbon][7]


yarn:
[wool of the andes tweed worsted][8]
80% peruvian highland wool, 20% donegal tweed, 110yds/50g
colorways: sarsaparilla heather and oyster

[wool of the andes tweed worsted][9]
100% peruvian highland wool, 110yds/50g
colorway: crane heather

 colorful yarn:
mary maxim prism: https://tidd.ly/3hb1ab5
mellowspun: https://tidd.ly/3jgowfs 


yardage:
small (medium, large)
80 (100, 210) yds


yarn substitutions:
[wecrochet brava][10]
100% premium acrylic, 218yds/100g

[wecrochet brava tweed][11]
97% premium acrylic, 3% viscose, 218yds/100g

[lion brand color theory][12]
100% acrylic, 246yds/100g


abbreviations
blo - back loop only
ch - chain
rs - right side
sc - single crochet
st(s) - stitch(es)
ws - wrong side


gauge:
16 sts x 8 rows unblocked= 4x4” in pattern. not critical for this project.


not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][13]


sizes:
three sizes (flat/finished width x height):

size small: (10 x 6/4 x 2.75)
size medium: (15.5 x 7.25/5 x 3.25)
size large: (22 x 8/6.5 x 3.75)


skill level:
intermediate
